title: Headline font used in People Magazine
content:
Looking for an ID of the font used for the headline, "Still a lot of work to do"  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307193300/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_2.PNG) | 1.21 MB |
author: aes206

comments.content: Quite likely not just an exclusive interview, but also an exclusive typeface. It looks like an extra-black swash cut of [Acta Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307193300/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/acta-display/).
